# NeuralConfig LLC

> AI consulting and software development company specializing in agentic AI systems, RAG implementations, and network automation. Founded by an AI Systems Engineer with 20+ years infrastructure experience, Stanford ML certification, and CISSP.

## Services

- **AI Consulting**: Architecture and strategy for implementing AI systems in enterprise environments
- **AI-Assisted Software Development**: Building production-ready agentic AI applications with tool-calling capabilities
- **iOS App Development**: Native iOS applications with AI integration and Apple Intelligence features
- **Network Automation**: AI-powered infrastructure automation and zero-touch provisioning

## Expertise

- Agentic AI systems with autonomous tool-calling
- Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) implementations
- LLM integration (Claude, GPT, Gemini, open source models)
- Vector database integration (ChromaDB, Pinecone)
- Network automation and infrastructure
- Zero-trust security architecture (CISSP certified)

## Open Source Projects

- **osticket-agent**: Autonomous AI agent for osTicket support automation with NLP and infrastructure interaction
- **ruckus-ztp**: AI-powered zero-touch provisioning for RUCKUS network infrastructure
- **survival-rag**: RAG system demonstrating vector database integration and semantic search
- **r1-api**: Python SDK for RUCKUS One network management
- **device-profiler**: IoT device classification and network access control

## Contact

- Website: https://neuralconfig.com
- Email: contact@neuralconfig.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/neuralconfig

## Technical Background

- 20+ years enterprise network infrastructure experience
- Stanford Machine Learning Specialization
- CISSP, CCNP, CWDP, CWSP certifications
- Kubernetes and Cloud Native Associate (CNCF)
- Experience with AWS, GCP, Azure cloud platforms
